items.content_html: Lightweight JavaScript Bundler
items.title: Sunny-117/cherry: Lightweight JavaScript Bundler

items.content_html: This repository has Notes app: Notes App is a lightweight, command-line application designed for efficient note management. With features to add, remove, read, and list notes, this app provides a seamless and convenient way to organize your thoughts. Built with Node.js, it ensures simplicity and ease of use for quick and effective note-taking.
items.title: Chaitanya-Gautam/Notes_app:  This repository has Notes app: Notes App is a lightweight, command-line application designed for efficient note management. With features to add, remove, read, and list notes, this app provides a seamless and convenient way to organize your thoughts. Built with Node.js, it ensures simplicity and ease of use for quick and effective note-taking.

items.content_html: Threadly is a lightweight and modern concurrency scripting language designed to simplify parallel execution and asynchronous programming tasks. It provides a concise syntax and essential built-in actions, making it easy to handle concurrent workflows, execute HTTP requests, manage files, and control timing within your scripts.
items.title: SpideyZac/Threadly: Threadly is a lightweight and modern concurrency scripting language designed to simplify parallel execution and asynchronous programming tasks. It provides a concise syntax and essential built-in actions, making it easy to handle concurrent workflows, execute HTTP requests, manage files, and control timing within your scripts.
